com.example.shoutout.activity.fragment

Class PostFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.shoutout.activity.fragment.PostFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class PostFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    Fragment showcasing a post. The information shown includes all of the following:
    • User's avatar
    • User's display name
    • User's username
    • Text contents (optional)
    • Image (optional)
    • Date posted
    • Number of likes
    Since:
    April 29, 2021

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PostFragment.IsPostLikedListener
      Asynchronous listener for checking whether or not a post has already been liked

      The image view of the avatar of the user that uploaded this post

      The image view of the post's attached image (may be empty)

      A listener for when this fragment needs to figure out if the local user has already liked this post

      Reference used to change the like counter (for display purposes only)

      Listener for handling when the user clicks on a post's profile avatar

      The post to be featured in this fragment
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean processingLike
      Reference used to keep track of the state between when the user clicks the like button and when the server has fully processed the like/unlike request

      Logging tag
      private android.widget.TextView text_displayName
      The text view of the user's display name
      private android.widget.TextView text_likeCount
      The text view showing the number of times the post has been liked by other users

      The text view of the post's text contents (may be empty)
      private android.widget.TextView text_posted
      The text view of the date of which this post was uploaded
      private android.widget.TextView text_username
      The text view of the user's username
      private User user
      An instance of the user that uploaded the post

      • setIsPostLikedListener

        public void setIsPostLikedListener(PostFragment.IsPostLikedListener listener)
        Update the listener that checks if this post should be liked. Important: This should be set before the fragment is attached to the parent activity.
        Parameters:
        listener - A listener that checks if this post should be liked
